topic.title: Reusing generated text strings from org.dita.base

body.p: If you have already added a set of HTML localization strings located in DITA-OT/plugins/org.dita.base/xsl/common, eg strings-ta-ta.xml, you can reuse it by copying it to 'ta-dita-strings.xml' file in the target strings folder. To register the 'ta-dita-strings.xml' file, add the following entry to the end of the 'langlist.xml' file:<lang xml:lang="ta" filename="ta-dita-strings.xml"/>
